page.title: 01Cairnbanno, New Deer
page.content: This area of the countryside is to the south west of New Deer village. There are few trees, mostly clustered around the scattered farmhouses, with the occasional small plantation or shelterbelt. The farms in this area are mostly mixed livestock and arable units with a few dairy farms as well. The farmers in the district are very sociable and there is a thriving Cairnbanno Community Club which is affiliated to New deer Community Association. The Community Club is centred on the old Cairnbanno School. The Members have a lively calendar of activities, including drama, bowling and whist.
